text: Rodrigo García (born 24 August 1959) is a Colombian-born television and movie director and screenwriter. He is the son of Nobel Prize-winning author Gabriel García Márquez."Gabriel Garcia Marquez’s son on the art of storytelling". Inquirer. 15 October 2011. He directed movies and television series such as Nine Lives and Albert Nobbs, and episodes of several HBO series, Six Feet Under, Carnivàle, and Big Love. Barcha was born in Bogotá, Colombia. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Movie directors Category:Television directors Category:Screenwriters Category:Gabriel García Márquez Category:Writers from Bogotá
title: Rodrigo García
